column2: #| fig-cap: Simulated data illustrating that signal strength is determined by partitioning variability. There is a clear signal (difference in the location across groups) for Dataset A but not for Dataset B.
#| fig-alt: Two datasets are summarized by side-by-side boxplots for three groups.  The boxplots
group = rep(c("Group I", "Group II", "Group III"), each = 30, times = 2),
y = runif(180, min = mids - halfrange, max = mids + halfrange)
